tool_description:
An easy to use API to create one time links.

One Time Links API is a powerful tool that revolutionizes the way you create and share links securely. With our API, developers can effortlessly generate unique, time-limited URLs that provide a secure and convenient method for sharing information and resources.


 ![](https://tip.ep-proxy.net/t/ra-otl-main)
name: One Time Links
title: One Time Links

api_list.name: Password
api_list.description: Create a One-Time-Link that returns a page with a hidden password when visited.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://one-time-links.p.rapidapi.com/v1/create/password"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "one-time-links.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://one-time-links.p.rapidapi.com/v1/create/password"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Text

id.description: ID that uniquely identifies your One-Time-Link

expiresAt.description: Time after One-Time-Link will be no longer available

api_list.name: HTTP redirection
